summary.para: Defines stream buffer parameters that remain constant while an XAPO is locked. Used with the method.

remarks.para: The byte size of the respective stream buffer must be at least MaxFrameCount × (pFormat->nBlockAlign) bytes.
Windows 10 (XAudio2.9); Windows 8, Windows Phone 8 (XAudio 2.8); DirectX SDK (XAudio 2.7)

summary.para: A WAVFORMATEX describing the format for the stream buffer.
Maximum number of frames in the stream buffer that would ever be required to handle, irrespective of dynamic parameter settings.
